languages.text: {n}Брезгливая гримаса возникает на лице Инцендии, голос ее дрожит от гнева и напряжения.{/n} "Ты еще не понял{mf||а}, {name}, что все изменилось. Время, когда ты делал{mf||а} лишь то, что хотел{mf||а}, прошло — настало время делать то, что должно".

{n}Incendia's face twists in displeasure, and her voice trembles with anger and tension:{/n} "You still cannot grasp the fact that everything has changed, {name}. Gone is the time when you could do only what you wished to do. It is now time to do what you must."
languages.original_text: {n}Брезгливая гримаса возникает на лице Инцендии, голос ее дрожит от гнева и напряжения.{/n} "Ты еще не понял{mf||а}, {name}, что все изменилось. Время, когда ты делал{mf||а} лишь то, что хотел{mf||а}, прошло — настало время делать то, что должно".

traits.locale_text: {n}An averse grimace appears on Incendia's face, and her voice trembles with anger and tension.{/n} "You still cannot grasp the fact that everything has changed, {name}. Gone is the time when you could do only what you wished to do. It is now time to do what you must."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}因森蒂娅脸不满地抽搐着，她的声音颤抖，充满了愤怒与紧张的意味。{/n}“你还是没有意识到，一切都已经变了，{name}。想做什么就做什么的时代已经一去不复返了。现在，你该做你必须要做的事情了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia's face twists in displeasure, and her voice trembles with anger and tension:{/n} "You still cannot grasp the fact that everything has changed, {name}. Gone is the time when you could do only what you wished to do. It is now time to do what you must."

traits.locale_text: {n}因森蒂娅脸上浮现出厌恶的表情，声音颤抖着，充满了愤怒与紧张。{/n}“你还是没有意识到，一切都已经变了，{name}。想做什么就做什么的时代已经一去不复返了。现在，你该做你必须要做的事情了。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}インセンディアが不愉快げに顔をゆがめる。彼女の声は怒りと緊張で震えていた。{/n}「{name}、お前はすべてが変わったことを、まだ理解していないようだな。好きな事が出来ていた時代は、もう終わった。やらなければならない事をする時期が来たのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia's face twists in displeasure, and her voice trembles with anger and tension:{/n} "You still cannot grasp the fact that everything has changed, {name}. Gone is the time when you could do only what you wished to do. It is now time to do what you must."

traits.locale_text: {n}インセンディアが不愉快げに顔をゆがめる。彼女の声は怒りと緊張で震えていた。{/n}「{name}、お前はすべてが変わったことを、まだ理解していないようだな。好きな事が出来ていた時代は、もう終わった。やらなければならない事をする時期が来たのだ」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}El rostro de Incendia se contorsiona en una mueca de desagrado y su voz tiembla por la ira y la tensión.{/n} «Sigue sin entender que todo ha cambiado, {name}. Atrás quedaron los tiempos en los que podía hacer lo que quisiera. Ahora es el deber el que llama».
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia's face twists in displeasure, and her voice trembles with anger and tension:{/n} "You still cannot grasp the fact that everything has changed, {name}. Gone is the time when you could do only what you wished to do. It is now time to do what you must."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una mueca de aversión aparece en el rostro de Incendia y su voz tiembla por la ira y la tensión.{/n} «Sigue sin entender que todo ha cambiado, {name}. Atrás quedaron los tiempos en los que podía hacer lo que quisiera. Ahora es el deber el que llama».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Incendia verzieht das Gesicht und ihre Stimme zittert vor Wut und Anspannung.{/n} "Ihr begreift noch immer nicht, dass sich alles verändert hat, {name}. Die Zeiten, in denen Ihr nur tun konntet, was Ihr wollt, sind vorbei. Jetzt ist es Zeit, zu tun, was Ihr müsst."
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia's face twists in displeasure, and her voice trembles with anger and tension:{/n} "You still cannot grasp the fact that everything has changed, {name}. Gone is the time when you could do only what you wished to do. It is now time to do what you must."

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine unwillige Grimasse erscheint auf Incendias Gesicht und ihre Stimme zittert vor Wut und Anspannung.{/n} "Ihr begreift noch immer nicht, dass sich alles verändert hat, {name}. Die Zeiten, in denen Ihr nur tun konntet, was Ihr wollt, sind vorbei. Jetzt ist es Zeit, zu tun, was Ihr müsst."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Une grimace de dégoût déforme le visage d'Incendia et sa voix tendue tremble de colère :{/n} « Vous ne réalisez toujours pas que tout a changé, {name}. L'époque où vous pouviez faire ce que vous vouliez est révolue. Il est temps de faire votre devoir. »
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia's face twists in displeasure, and her voice trembles with anger and tension:{/n} "You still cannot grasp the fact that everything has changed, {name}. Gone is the time when you could do only what you wished to do. It is now time to do what you must."

traits.locale_text: {n}Une grimace hostile déforme le visage d'Incendia et sa voix tendue tremble de colère :{/n} « Vous ne réalisez toujours pas que tout a changé, {name}. L'époque où vous pouviez faire ce que vous vouliez est révolue. Il est temps de faire votre devoir. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Yüzü hoşnutsuzlukla buruşan İncendia'nın sesi, öfke ve gerginlikle titremeye başlıyor.{/n} "Her şeyin değiştiği gerçeğini hâlâ idrak edememişsin {name}. Yalnızca canının istediği şeyi yaptığın zamanlar geçmişte kaldı. Artık yapman gerekeni yapacaksın."
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia's face twists in displeasure, and her voice trembles with anger and tension:{/n} "You still cannot grasp the fact that everything has changed, {name}. Gone is the time when you could do only what you wished to do. It is now time to do what you must."

traits.locale_text: {n}İncendia'nın yüzü hoşntusuzlukla buruşuyor ve sesi öfke ve gerginlikle titremeye başlıyor.{/n} "Her şeyin değiştiği gerçeğini hâlâ idrak edememişsin {name}. Yalnızca canının istediği şeyi yaptığın zamanlar geçmişte kaldı. Artık yapman gerekeni yapmanın zamanı."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
